mapper.select: SELECT fc.payment_mode, fc.cheque_date, fc.payment_amount, fc.cheque_number, fc.bank, fc.account_holder, fc.transaction_number, fc.status, fc.commission_amount, b.booking_code, b.project_name, b.member_name FROM franchisee_commission fc INNER JOIN bookings b ON fc.booking_id = b.booking_id WHERE fc.franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId} ORDER BY b.project_name

SELECT fc.payment_mode, fc.cheque_date, fc.payment_amount,fc.franchisee_name, fc.cheque_number, fc.bank, fc.account_holder, fc.transaction_number, fc.status, fc.commission_amount, b.booking_code, b.project_name, b.member_name,f.pan FROM franchisee_commission fc INNER JOIN franchisee f ON f.franchisee_id = fc.franchisee_id INNER JOIN bookings b ON fc.booking_id = b.booking_id WHERE f.commission_percentage>0 AND f.record_status='A' ORDER BY fc.franchisee_name
